choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss's Name], 
I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to inform you that I have decided to leave the company and pursue other opportunities. 
After careful consideration, I have realized that it is time for me to move on and explore new challenges and growth opportunities. While it is difficult to say goodbye to the great team and colleagues here, I feel confident in my decision and believe it is the right step for me at this point in my career.
I would like to express my gratitude for the opportunity to work with such a talented group of individuals and for the support and guidance provided during my time here. I have learned a great deal from my experiences and will always cherish the memories and relationships built while working alongside you all.
Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist in transitioning my responsibilities and ensuring a smooth handover process. 
Thank you again for everything, and best regards,
[Your Name]
